dct_description_sm: United States. Army Map Service Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section. G.S.G.S. no. 4378 Lambert conical orthomorphic projection. Enlarged from the from the 1/25,000 Italian map dated 1931 (revised from air photographs).
dct_publisher_sm: Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1943.
